page.title: 02RECREATION IN KIP VALLEY
page.content: The recreational facilities are mainly found in 3 areas: IBM factory, Greenock High School - youth club & swimming pool (open to public once a week) and Invekip village. In the IBM there is an outdoor bowling club, social and sports clubs and a creche for members. There is a library, public park and a large marina. As you can judge from the information, Inverkip has more facilities than the private housing estate at Flatterton, so in Inverkip the people interviewed were satisfied with the facilities but in Greenock they are said to be unsatisfactory. Greenock people interviewed suggested that more play areas for children and more places like community centres etc, to keep children off the streets, should be built in their area.
